Name: Buddha Park of Ravangla
Description: A peaceful hilltop park featuring a massive Buddha statue, surrounded by panoramic views of the Himalayas.

Name: Red Fort
Description: An iconic UNESCO World Heritage site, the Red Fort stands as a symbol of India’s rich Mughal history and architecture.

Name: Athirappilly Waterfalls
Description: Known as the Niagara of India, Athirappilly is the largest waterfall in Kerala, surrounded by lush green forests.

Name: Naini Lake
Description: A serene lake nestled among mountains in Nainital, perfect for boating and enjoying tranquil views.

Name: Adiyogi Shiva Statue
Description: The world’s largest bust statue dedicated to Lord Shiva, located at the foothills of the Velliangiri Mountains in Coimbatore.
